reviews.review: It is, in fact, the source of all COD and Battlefield games... Just read the fucking tittle!

This is a great well rounded game but if you are switching from COD like I did u will have a very hard time with the kills. Like shooting and getting one shot kills. for me i love the switch and probaly never going to get previous CODs or upcoming ones to get. The maps are great for a great price. I also love how you have to earn your money with kills, so say if you were a new beginner in a game you would get 800 dolars.< sorry idk spelling. but the games last as long as you can play just need people in the server with you. if you get it right now(december 23) with the christmas sale or any other game sale get it.
A CS 1.6 után egy MUST HAVE örök darab és most meg lehet kapni szinte ingyen a CS: GO mellé!

Counter-Strike:Source.... A 2000 firstperson shooter game from valve and remake from the first Counter strike.  You can choose two teams CT(Counter Terrorist ) or T( Terrorist.) there are two types of gamemodes to choose from and those are Hosstage rescue (CT) or demolition(T)  In the first gamemode u must rescue all 4 hostages from the Terrorist or kill all of them.  
and in the second gamemode, Terrorist must plant the bomb to one of two bomb sites A or B once then CT's have 30 seconds to defuse it before it detonates.  there are all kinds of weapons to buy.  I recomend this for you.
Good graphics, nice fast paced gameplay, an excellent introduction to the FPS world!

MY DAUGHTER TIMMOTHY IS IN REHAB BECAUSE OF THIS GAME! It is too good and too adictive with its various game modes and good Communitys. This game is old and one of the best and classic games amound PC gamers! 10/10. Five stars. Slow Clap. Well done valve you never cease to amaze me!

This game will provide you with hours of fun. With over 700 hours of time clocked into this game i can safley say that this game is well worth a purchase. If you don't like Counter Strike: Global Offensive, this is a good alternative. While i wasn't big on the vanilla game, most of my time was spent in Zombie Escape and Zombie Mod servers.

One of my all time favorite first person shooters! It's purely a masterpiece, a work of art. If you like first person shooters than this is the game for you! Unlike Call of Duty or Battlefield the add on maps are free via the Steam workshop! If you are new to PC gaming than you should get this game before any other game. Why? Because this game rewards skill and if you don't have any (Like most new PC gamers, Including myself at the time when I was new.) it can help you build it up. Unlike CoD Counter Strike doesnt reward you for being a noob. If you get this game and you "suck" like I did when I first got it try playing by your self with bots. This game is incredibly fun to play by your self but the fun just multiplies when you add the aspect of playing with friends. If you don't have many PC gamer friends then Counter-Strike: Source is still the game for you! You can join random servers and find really cool people like your self to start playing with. If you can't decide to get Global Offensive or Source I would say go with source. Why you ask? Well Source is much easier to run but not only that it is just much more fun. Now yes this is  my personal opinion and Global Offensive vs. Source is just about like Ford vs. Chevy but if you get source you'll have the source engine which allows for many more games and free mods! Counter-Strike: Source is a 11/10 Six Star game. You will not regret this purchase!
